channel.title: Runserver.bat
channel.description: Can someone post a working Runserver batch file code that is compatible with JDK 6u3? Thanks, -J

item.title: Runserver.bat
item.dc:creator: @ham8legs ham8legs
item.description:
@ham8legs wrote:

:menu
@echo off
title Menu
cls
echo.
echo cr = compile and run
echo r = run
echo c = compile
echo.
set /p variable=Command:
if %variable%==cr goto cnr
if %variable%==c goto compiler
if %variable%==r goto run1

:compiler
@echo off
title Compiler
cls
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin\javac" *.java
pause
goto menu
:cnr
@echo off
title Compiler
cls
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin\javac" *.java
pause
goto run
:run1
@echo off
cls
title Server Starter
echo --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
echo -                                                                              -
echo -                              starting Server                                 -
echo -                                                                              -
echo --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
pause
:run
@echo off
cls
title Server Starter
echo --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
echo -                                                                              -
echo -                              starting Server                                 -
echo -                                                                              -
echo --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
pause
